alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 8:13PM CDT until July 28 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jo Daviess County in northwestern Illinois... Northern Jackson County in east central Iowa... Southeastern Dubuque County in northeastern Iowa... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 813 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Donatus, or near Galena, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Galena, Bellevue, East Dubuque, Hanover, Elizabeth, La Motte, Menominee, Council Hill, St. Donatus, Zwingle, Guilford, Rice, Otter Creek, Whitton, North Hanover, Elizabeth Fairgrounds, Dubuque Regional Airport, Aiken and Rockdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
